column1: * 1964 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a Letter to Jane T. Sibley.
* 1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a Letter to Nancy Smith (30 May 1966).
* 1973 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a Letter to Philip Brown.
* 2010 - Guillermo del Toro announces he will no longer direct The Hobbit (film series).
* 2014 - Tolkien in the New Century is published.
:There are no known events on this day.Category:Datesfi:30. toukokuuta
